best_estimator:
Pipeline(steps=[('preprocessor',
                 ColumnTransformer(transformers=[('num',
                                                  Pipeline(steps=[('imputer',
                                                                   SimpleImputer(strategy='median')),
                                                                  ('scaler',
                                                                   StandardScaler())]),
                                                  ['index',
                                                   'number_of_siblings',
                                                   'n_male', 'n_female', 'age',
                                                   'hours_per_week',
                                                   'attendance_rate',
                                                   'attendance_rate_missing',
                                                   'attendance_age_ratio',
                                                   'engagement_score',
                                                   'learning_style_visual',
                                                   'lear...
                                                                                 sparse_output=False))]),
                                                  ['direct_admission', 'CCA',
                                                   'learning_style',
                                                   'student_id', 'gender',
                                                   'tuition', 'sleep_time',
                                                   'wake_time',
                                                   'mode_of_transport',
                                                   'bag_color', 'age_group',
                                                   'attendance_category',

                                                   'gender_x_learning_style',
                                                   'age_group_x_attendance_category',
                                                   'gender_x_CCA',
                                                   'learning_style_x_tuition'])])),
                ('regressor', Ridge(alpha=0.1, random_state=42))])
